dc_title_s: Map of Chicago, showing original subdivisions, 1844 to 1862 /prepared by Homer Hoyt from ante-fire plats of the Chicago Title and Trust Company.
dc_description_s: Scale approximately 1:175,300; Master and use copy. Digital master created according to Benchmark for Faithful Reproductions of Monographs and Serials, Version 1. Digital Library Federation, December 2002.
dc_creator_sm: University of Chicago Social Science Research Committee
